intro: Schizoglossum robustum var. pubiflorum, commonly known as the pubiflorous schizoglossum, is a flowering plant native to the Andean region of South America. The variety pubiflorum is distinguished by its hairy flowers, which give it a unique appearance and aid in pollination by providing a textured surface for insects.
